Posts.Content: My pathology report states resection margins of invasive tumour: negative. grossly and microscopically however tumour lies within 0.1 cm of superiour deep and superficial margins. Does anyone know if this means my margins were clear or not and after having chemo twice and radiation 25 times do I have and chance or reaccurance my receptors are negative and her-2 is also negative?
Posts.Title: Close Margins
